= GIỚI THIỆU =

KM233_SOM (LOCUS) là CPU module sử dụng MPU i.MX233 của Freescale. Module được thiết kế nhằm phục vụ cho việc học tập Linux.

[http://stm32vn.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/image/IMX233_SOM.jpg]

= THÔNG SỐ =

{{{
. MPU ARM926EJ-S™, 454 MHz maximum speed
   . 16 KB I/D Cache
   . Power Management Unit (PMU)
   . Mixed Signal Audio
   . LCD Controller
   . HS Device/Host + PHY
   . 3 x UART
   . 2 x SSP
   . I2C Master
   . 6 Channel 12-bit Low Resolution ADC (LRADC)
   . Serial Audio IF x2
   . SPDIF
   . External memory interface:
     + 1.8V mDDR, DDR1 w/2.5V regulator
     + Hardware BCH (up to 20-bit correction) and RS ECC8
     + NAND Flash support for SLC/MLC and managed NAND

. MEMORY DDR 64MB 133MHz (266M data rate)
. Micro SD card slot (2nd uSD option)
. ATMEL SPI serial data flash (option)
. I2C eeprom.
. Quadrant 2.54 mm pitch pin header I/O output (easy to design hardware)
}}}
